0.11.x.message: Hi Weavers! Please join us for the first Weave Community Gathering, May 15th at 1pm EST (Wed, May 15, 2024 8:00 PM CEST). The purpose of this gathering is for people who are excited about The Weave to get to know each other, meet the developers, get an overview of our road-map, ask questions and give feedback. Please join the Weavers group before you arrive as we will be using various Weave tools to take notes etc as part of the meeting: https://lightningrodlabs.org/we?we://group/d86f59b5-def4-4fbb-961e-be487d87df74 - Zoom link for the Gathering: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/82255580994?pwd=Tmh6TFJWcm9kak0rZzViY2dYQUdXUT09

Moss version 0.11.12 contains mainly invisible changes to improve performance and adds more functionality to the debugging panel (double-click on the version number in the bottom left to open the debugging panel).

Moss versions 0.11.9 and 0.11.10 contain a bug that prevents automatic updates from succeeding on macOS and Windows. To resolve the issue, manually download and install the latest version of Moss from https://theweave.social/moss
